data.title: Manic
data.short: Main class for managing different javascript frameworks.
data.body: public class | version 2.2.0 | source Just another JavaScript library. # *Constructor Summary* ## **Public Constructor** --- | | | | |-:|:-|:-:| | public | `constructor()` Initialize events, requests and services. | | | # *Member Summary* ## **Public Members** --- | | | |-:|:-|:-:| | public | `[services]: Service` Iterable collection of services. | | | public get | `scriptCollection: string` Iterate through services and call loadServices for each service. | since 2.0.0 | | public get | `version: string: *` Returns current version number. | since 2.0.0 | ## **Private Members** --- | | | | |-:|:-|:-:| | private | `_contextMgr: Object` | | | private | `_events: Object` | | | private | `_first: boolean` Use to indicate wheter the Service iterator is running for the first time. | | | private | `_request: Object` | | | private | `_response: Object` | | | private | `_version: Object` | | # *Method Summary* ## **Public Methods** --- | | | | |-:|:-|:-:| | public | `addScript(response: Object, script: *)` | since 2.2.0 | | public | `getContent(site: *)` Deprecated! Use _render_ instead. | since 2.1.0 | | public | `insertScript(response: *, script: *)` Deprecated! Use _addScript_ instead. | since 2.0.0 | | public | `isArray(e: *): boolean` | since 2.0.0 | | public | `isPromise(e: *): boolean` | since 2.0.0 | | public | `loadJS(url: string): *` | since 2.0.0 | | public | `loadJSON(url: *): *` | since 2.0.0 | | public | `loadScripts(service: Service)` This method is deprecated. | since 2.0.0 | | public | `loadServices(service: Service): *` Load service and initialize if function init exists. | since 2.2.0 | | public | `next(db: Object, key: string): Object` | since 1.1.2 | | public | `off(eventName: string, fn: function)` Deletes a function with a given name an its function. | | | public | `on(eventName: string, fn: function)` Creates a function on the fly, which can be invoced by the trigger function. | | | public | `prev(db: Object, key: string): Object` | since 1.1.2 | | public | `render(site: *)` | since 2.2.0 | | public | `retrigger(eventName: string, data: Object)` Triggers eventName as a function and assigns data as parameter. | | # *Public Constructors* ## **public:** --- `constructor()` Initialize events, requests and services. Events # *Public Members* ## **public:** --- `[services]: Service` Iterable collection of services. Each service contains the _url_ and _init_ function, which is called in _loadServices_. ## _**Properties:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | framework | `Service` | optional | The framework of your desire. | | markdown | `Service` | optional | The markdown of your wish. | | route | `Service` | optional | The route service of your use. | --- `scriptCollection: string` Iterate through services and call _loadServices_ for each service. ## _**Return**_: | | | |-:|:-| | `string` | Injects scrtipts for each needed service at the bottom of the document, before body ends. | ## _**TODO:**_ redefine scriptCollection --- `version: string: *` Returns current version number. ## _**Return**_: | | | |:-|:-| | `string` | Returns the version number as **major.minor.patch**. | # *Private Members* --- `_contextMgr: Object` ## _**Properties:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | container | `Object` | | | | content | `Object` | | | --- `_events: Object` ## _**Properties:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | eventName | `string` | | | | fn | `function` | | | --- `_first: boolean` Use to indicate wheter the Service iterator is running for the first time. If so, then initialize the services into an item list. --- `_request: Object` ## _**Properties:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | id | `number` | default: 1 | Id of requested article. | | type | `string` | default: info | Defines what _type_ of data is requested. _type_ can be _info or list_. | | slug | `string` | default: home | Defines what page is requested to be rendered. | ## _**TODO:**_ change request properties --- `_response: Object` ## _**TODO:**_ Handle response object via member. --- `_version: Object` ## _**Properties:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | major | `number` | | | | minor | `number` | | | | patch | `number` | | | # *Public Methods* --- since 2.2.0 `addScript(response: Object, script: *)` ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | response | `Object` | | | | script | `*` | | !NOT USED! Passed over parameter doesn't do anything. | ## _**See:**_ [Stackoverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/950087/how-do-i-include-a-javascript-file-in-another-javascript-file/950146#950146) ## _**TODO:**_ write docs about it... --- since 2.1.0 `getContent(site: *)` Deprecated! Use _render_ instead. ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | site | `*` | | | --- since 2.0.0 `insertScript(response: *, scrtipt: *)` Deprecated! Use _addScript_ instead. ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | response | `*` | | | | script | `*` | | | --- since 2.0.0 `isArray(e: *): boolean` ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | e | `*` | | | ## _**Return:**_ `boolean` ## _**TODO:**_ write docs about it... --- since 2.0.0 `isPromise(e: *): boolean` ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | e | `*` | | | ## _**Return:**_ `boolean` ## _**See:**_ [Stackoverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/27746304/how-do-i-tell-if-an-object-is-a-promise/45762727#45762727) ## _**TODO:**_ write docs about it... --- since 2.0.0 `loadJS(url: string): *` ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | url | `string` | | URL is taken from _Service_ to request for its script. | ## _**Return:**_ `*` ## _**TODO:**_ write docs about it... --- since 2.0.0 `loadJSON(url: *): *` ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | url | `*` | | | ## _**Return:**_ `*` ## _**TODO:**_ write docs about it... --- since 2.0.0 `loadScripts(service: Service)` Deprecated! Use _loadServices_ instead. ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | service | `Service` | | | ## _**Return:**_ `*` --- since 2.2.0 `loadServices(service: Service): *` Load _service_ and initialize if function _init_ exists. If _service.url_ is an array of URL's, then load each URL, before calling _init_. ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | service | `Service` | | | ## _**Return:**_ `*` --- since 1.1.2 `next(db: Object, key: string): Object` ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | db | `Object` | | | | key | `string` | | | ## _**Return:**_ `Object (nullable: true)` Returns the next data payload of given key. --- `off(eventName: string, fn: function)` Deletes a function with a given name an its function. It can not be triggered afterwards. ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | eventName | `string` | | _eventName_ to be deleted. | | fn | `function` | optional | Function which will be deleted with respect to _eventName_. | ## _**TODO:**_ events must also be mutable --- `on(eventName: string, fn: function)` Creates a function on the fly, which can be invoced by the trigger function. ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | eventName | `string` | | Functionname to be created | | fn | `function` | optional | Function which will be called with respect to the eventName. | --- since 1.1.2 `prev(db: Object, key: string): Object` ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | db | `Object` | | | | key | `string` | | | ## _**Return:**_ `Object (nullable: true)` Returns the previous data payload of given key. --- since 2.2.0 `render(site: *)` ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | site | `*` | | | ## _**TODO:**_ template should be configured in settings `render` use _mootools_ selector to get a desired element. These functions must be provided hy the `[services]` middleware stack for a given service. --- `trigger(eventName: string, data: Object)` Triggers eventName as a function and assigns data as parameter. ## _**Params:**_ | Name | Type | Attribute | Description | |:-|:-|:-|:-| | site | `*` | | | ## _**TODO:**_ description of data is needed. --- | | |-:| | Generated by ESDoc(1.0.3) |
